function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of Mycobacterium tuberculosis in the built environment due to its stability in air and low infectious dose","Impact":"Spread of tuberculosis and increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation and air filtration, use of UV-C light for air disinfection","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, HEPA filters, UV-C air disinfection systems","People":"Individuals in indoor spaces, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Ineffective focus on high-level air filtration in central HVAC systems for COVID-19 mitigation","Impact":"Limited effectiveness of air filtration in reducing COVID-19 transmission in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of in-room air disinfection systems, improved ventilation, targeted air filtration at the room level","Technologies":"In-room air disinfection systems, improved ventilation systems, targeted air filtration systems","People":"Individuals in indoor spaces, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, healthcare facilities"}]}
